metadata.synopsis: Laezel meets Vlaaktih as a hologram. Avatar can decide if she accepts her orders to kill the prisoner or refuse. In both cases, the planecaster is activated.If you refuse, Vlaakith orders the inquisitor if alive to kill you if you try to exit the room or theatens to hunt you down if he's already dead. Orphan Laezel automatically accepts Vlaakith's orders.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Trigger the Vlaakith dialog after speaking to the Templar or after killing him with Avatar Laezel or Orphaned Laezel.

13.speaker: Vlaakith
13.text: Inquisitor W'wargaz was potent. We are impressed.
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of player reacting to hearing a disembodied voice.NodeContext: Vlaakith should sligjhtly overpronounce every word, think Davros from Doctor Who, each syllable drips with a kind of mad, ancient evil

0.text: *The goddess of your kin. The Queen of the Astral, the stillest of Seas. Vlaakith has risen.*
0.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The planecaster vibrates, shaking the ground around it. 
Flares of light curl up in its centre and grow to full form. 
Vlaakith appears, awesome and terrible, at least twice the size of any human, a hologram in a haze of astral flares.

3.text: *The goddess of your kin. The Queen of the Astral, the stillest of Seas. Vlaakith has risen.*
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Inquisitor kneels before Vlaakith's image, surprised to see her. All of his staff kneel also. NodeContext: pronounced VLAH-kith gawg shkaath ZAI (meaning 'For the honour of Vlaakith!')

78.speaker: Narrator
78.text: *The goddess of your kin. The Queen of the Astral, the stillest of Seas. Vlaakith has risen.*
78.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Inquisitor kneels before Vlaakith's image, surprised to see her. All of his staff kneel also. NodeContext: pronounced VLAH-kith gawg shkaath ZAI (meaning 'For the honour of Vlaakith!')

16.speaker: Ch'r'ai W'wargaz
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Inquisitor kneels before Vlaakith's image, surprised to see her. All of his staff kneel also. NodeContext: pronounced VLAH-kith gawg shkaath ZAI (meaning 'For the honour of Vlaakith!')

21.text: You are permitted to look upon me. You are invited to kneel.
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith, unfazed in the least, motions everyone present to rise.l Everyone rises.

65.speaker: Vlaakith
65.text: You are permitted to look upon me. You are invited to kneel.
65.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith, unfazed in the least, motions everyone present to rise.l Everyone rises.

83.speaker: Lae'zel
83.text: Kneel in reverence to your queen.
83.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith, unfazed in the least, motions everyone present to rise.l Everyone rises.

14.speaker: Lae'zel
14.text: Stay standing, exactly as you are.
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith, unfazed in the least, motions everyone present to rise.l Everyone rises.

61.speaker: Lae'zel
61.text: My queen. You honour me with your presence.
61.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith, unfazed in the least, motions everyone present to rise.l Everyone rises.

86.speaker: Vlaakith
86.text: To honour me is to obey me. On your knees.
86.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith, unfazed in the least, motions everyone present to rise.l Everyone rises.

90.speaker: Lae'zel
90.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith, unfazed in the least, motions everyone present to rise.l Everyone rises.

59.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith, unfazed in the least, motions everyone present to rise.l Everyone rises.

58.speaker: Lae'zel
58.context: NodeContext: UR-lawn | al-KYE-uh with a gutteral 'k'

27.speaker: Vlaakith
27.text: You walk a fine line, child. Tread carefully lest you fall.
27.context: NodeContext: UR-lawn | al-KYE-uh with a gutteral 'k'

64.text: You bear that which is mine. I presume you have come to return it. Lae'zel.
64.context: NodeContext: UR-lawn | al-KYE-uh with a gutteral 'k'

56.speaker: Vlaakith
56.text: You bear that which is mine. I presume you have come to return it. Lae'zel.
56.context: NodeContext: UR-lawn | al-KYE-uh with a gutteral 'k'

28.speaker: Lae'zel
28.text: You know me. How can it be?
28.context: NodeContext: UR-lawn | al-KYE-uh with a gutteral 'k'

71.speaker: Vlaakith
71.text: Urlon of K'liir speaks most highly. As did Al'chaia before him.
71.context: NodeContext: UR-lawn | al-KYE-uh with a gutteral 'k'

85.speaker: Vlaakith
85.text: You seek purity. I may yet grant it.

77.speaker: Lae'zel
77.text: I am at your command, my Queen. The artefact is yours.
77.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith summons a floating hologram of the artefact and psionically spins it, toying with it.

48.speaker: Vlaakith
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith summons a floating hologram of the artefact and psionically spins it, toying with it.

49.speaker: Vlaakith
49.text: Extend your fealty one step further, and you will be rewarded.
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith summons a floating hologram of the artefact and psionically spins it, toying with it.

25.speaker: Vlaakith
25.text: That 'weapon' you carry - the Astral Prism - it is corrupted.
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith summons a floating hologram of the artefact and psionically spins it, toying with it.

79.speaker: Ch'r'ai W'wargaz
79.text: I shall cleanse it for you, my Queen. Tell me how.
79.context: CinematicNodeContext: W'wargaz appeals to his queen, desperate to be given this twisted honour

37.speaker: Vlaakith
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: After he is rebuked, W'wargaz stands sulkily behind the player

23.speaker: Vlaakith
23.text: There is someone inside. Their mind is warped, broken - a blight.
23.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a close of her fist, the artefact hologram is shattered in mid-air in a burst of astral flare.

34.speaker: Vlaakith
34.text: They are an agent of the Grand Design. Sent to sabotage the Astral Prism - our last defence against the return of the Illithid Empire.
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a close of her fist, the artefact hologram is shattered in mid-air in a burst of astral flare.

2.speaker: Vlaakith
2.text: As long as they live, the Prism is compromised.
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a close of her fist, the artefact hologram is shattered in mid-air in a burst of astral flare.

67.speaker: Vlaakith
67.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a close of her fist, the artefact hologram is shattered in mid-air in a burst of astral flare.

80.speaker: Vlaakith
80.text: Do this, and I will cleanse you. Do this -
80.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith looks the player over, and gives a ghastly, frightening smile.

51.speaker: Vlaakith
51.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith looks the player over, and gives a ghastly, frightening smile.

20.speaker: Lae'zel
20.text: As you say, my Queen. I will slay the Prism's occupant.
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith looks the player over, and gives a ghastly, frightening smile.

33.text: Use the planecaster's power to enter the artefact.
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith looks the player over, and gives a ghastly, frightening smile.

8.text: Use the planecaster's power to enter the artefact.
8.context: CinematicNodeContext: The image of Vlaakith flickers away within the planecaster, replaced by an image of the artefact suspended above the device.

84.speaker: Vlaakith
84.text: Use the planecaster's power to enter the artefact.

57.speaker: Vlaakith
57.text: Be wary of the creature's lying tongue. Cut it out, if you must.

53.speaker: Vlaakith
53.text: W'wargaz. She will not leave this room until it is done.

60.speaker: Vlaakith
60.text: Lae'zel - reject me and be undone. Serve, and we feast in Tu'narath together.

18.speaker: Vlaakith
18.text: Do not leave this room before it is done, or I will undo you - you will be your queen's child no longer.

4.speaker: Vlaakith
4.text: Do as I say, and we feast in Tu'narath together.

87.speaker: Lae'zel
87.text: I can't do that. The person inside protects me from the Absolute.

31.speaker: Vlaakith
31.text: You will do your duty - or be githyanki no longer.

38.speaker: Lae'zel
38.text: No. I am not your servant to be commanded on whim.

10.speaker: Vlaakith
10.text: Insolent child. You are my subject. My word is law.

39.speaker: Lae'zel
39.text: The god-queen of my people cannot kill someone herself?
39.context: NodeContext: again, she's close to losing it a bit here, "would you" said with max venom

6.speaker: Vlaakith
6.text: Perhaps I misheard. You would not speak ill of a god. Would you?
6.context: NodeContext: again, she's close to losing it a bit here, "would you" said with max venom

7.speaker: Lae'zel
7.text: I spoke too hastily - please forgive me.
7.context: CinematicNodeContext: at the word "wish", Vlaakith invokes the most powerful, reality-bending magic of the multiverse. The Wish. her image shakes, as does the room around the players. we cut to gameplay, and they die .

41.speaker: Lae'zel
41.text: I just think a real god could kill whoever she wants.
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: at the word "wish", Vlaakith invokes the most powerful, reality-bending magic of the multiverse. The Wish. her image shakes, as does the room around the players. we cut to gameplay, and they die .

22.speaker: Vlaakith
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: at the word "wish", Vlaakith invokes the most powerful, reality-bending magic of the multiverse. The Wish. her image shakes, as does the room around the players. we cut to gameplay, and they die .

15.speaker: Vlaakith
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: at the word "wish", Vlaakith invokes the most powerful, reality-bending magic of the multiverse. The Wish. her image shakes, as does the room around the players. we cut to gameplay, and they die .

45.speaker: Vlaakith
45.context: CinematicNodeContext: at the word "wish", Vlaakith invokes the most powerful, reality-bending magic of the multiverse. The Wish. her image shakes, as does the room around the players. we cut to gameplay, and they die .

55.speaker: Lae'zel
55.text: I will not give it to you. This artefact is mine by rights.

66.speaker: Vlaakith
66.text: No. It is not. To own something is to know it.

46.text: Ch'mar, zal'a Vlaakith. You know me.
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith, unfazed in the least, motions everyone present to rise.l Everyone rises.

43.text: Ch'mar, zal'a Vlaakith. You know me.
43.context: NodeContext: cheh-MAR ZAL-ah VLAH-kith - Vlaakith's will above all

42.speaker: Lae'zel
42.text: Ch'mar, zal'a Vlaakith. You know me.
42.context: NodeContext: cheh-MAR ZAL-ah VLAH-kith - Vlaakith's will above all

76.speaker: Lae'zel
76.text: I shall cleanse it for you, my Queen. Tell me how.

89.speaker: Lae'zel
89.text: Ascension? My queen. An honour gained, a burden borne. I will not waste a second.

72.speaker: Vlaakith
72.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of player reacting to hearing a disembodied voice. NodeContext: Vlaakith should sligjhtly overpronounce every word, think Davros from Doctor Who, each syllable drips with a kind of mad, ancient evil
